column5: Our 1 bedroom condo sleeps 6. The Bebe Beach and 61th St. Fishing pier is steps away. 5 minutes walk to 2 supermarkets, restaurants, bars, San Luis Conference Center. Close to major attractions and shopping -Treasure Pier, Moody's Garden, Schliterbah, etc. It has ocean view from the balcony and it's away from street noise. No need to look for parking on the beach because beach is across street.
